James Simpson front end programmer

I am a Freelance and speculative developer specializing in custom front end development. At current I'm most focused on HTML5, CSS3(LESS and SASS), AngularJS and jQuery development, but have experience with PHP, classic ASP, some Java on Google App Engine, dabbling in native Android development and JSP as well as SQL. Interested in Freelance remote opportunities and relocation for On-site employment in the US and Europe.

Resume( HTML PDF ) Rates (PDF)

Featured Projects professional client projects

Mammoth Mountain - Stories

A promotional site for Mammoth Mountain where the community can share stories of their experiences at the ski area. I completed the design to HTML/CSS/HTML implementation.

Footlocker - Colors That Run

A promotional site for Footlocker's Colors That Run promotion with ASICS. I completed the PSD to HTML/CS/JS conversion.

Lady Footlocker - Colors That Run

A promotional site for Lady Footlocker's Colors that Run promotion with ASICS. I completed the PSD to HTML/CS/JS conversion.

ASICS Training Collection

A promotional site for the ASISCS Training line of products built with LESS CSS, HTML5, Twitter Bootstrap and jQuery. I completed the front end implementation of the site design.

ASICS Trail Collection

The ASICS Trail Collection promotional site is a front end implementation I completed based on a fixed width desktop design I was given. From this I built the desktop website adding a responsive stylesheet for tablet and mobile devices.

Personal Website Projects my own concept, design and implementation

Mi Deal Shop

Mi Deal Shop aggregates sales from a handful of online retailers. Recently updated with an AngularJS driven front end from a previous custom single page implementation of my own. Responsive layouts based on Twitter Bootstrap with support down to mobile phones.

Visit Mi Deal Shop

CowBoom Watcher

CowBoom Watcher is a multi-platform project for promotion of CowBoom Deal of the Day sales. This is the web presence associated with the, Chrome Extension and the recently released CowBoom Watcher for Android BETA native application.

Visit CowBoom Watcher

Auto Woot!

Auto Woot! checks the woot.com network of websites for new sales periodically to keep you aprised of the active sales status. This is a perfect tool for watching Woot! Off sales when new items are made available as the one before sells out. No need to refresh the page manually or check multiple sites, it's all there at your disposal.

Visit Auto Woot!

JS Blog Stop

A site built to share Blogger customization scripts, widgets and gadgets I created while resharpening my web development skills. No longer updated with any regularity, though still seeing a few thousand page views each month.

Visit JS Blog Stop

JNet Ventures

A previous personal portfolio site built on top of blogger with custom javascript components of my own design and implementation. A no longer maintained past relic of my programming skills.

Visit JNet Ventures

Mi Twidget

A prototype service for custom embeddable and sharable fully interactive Twitter widgets with a Drag and Drop designer. Back end written in Java on Google App Engine, while the front end is a mix of Dojo Toolkit and jQuery. Unfortunately, Due to changes in the Twitter API and retirement of @Anywhere MiTwidget no longer functions. At this time there are no plans to revive the project.

AngularJS - a growing collection of demos featuring AngularJS

JSFiddles - my growing collection of JSFiddle experiments.

JS Templates - a simple client side templating plugin to jQuery aimed at JSON to markup transformation for AJAX applications.
